TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XPathItem extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 XQuery 1.0 和 XPath 2.0 数据模型中的项。

span.span: Represents an item in the XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 项是节点或一个原子值。An item is either a node or an atomic value.

block.para:
继承自类，你必须重写以下成员： :
When you inherit from the class, you must override the following members: :

Protected Sub New ()

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类构造函数来初始化此类型中的状态将调用此构造函数。This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract bool IsNode { get; }
.property instance bool IsNode
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsNode As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsNode { bool get(); };

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，获取一个值，该值指示项是否表示 XPath 节点或者原子值。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the item represents an XPath node or an atomic value.

value.span: 如果项表示 XPath 节点，则为 ；如果项表示原子值，则为 。

span.span: if the item represents an XPath node; if the item represents an atomic value.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract object TypedValue { get; }
.property instance object TypedValue
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property TypedValue As Object
public: abstract property System::Object ^ TypedValue { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，根据当前项的架构类型以最合适的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]类型的装箱对象的形式获取当前项。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type according to its schema type.

value.span: 以最合适的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 类型的装箱对象形式表示的当前项。

span.span: The current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果项的值不符合其指定架构类型的值属性的值等效属性。If the value of the item is not valid according to its specified schema type, the value of the property is equivalent to the value of the property. 有关类型的详细信息，支持在命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string Value { get; }
.property instance string Value
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Value As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ Value { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，获取项的 值。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the value of the item.
The value of the item.

summary.span: 按照指定的类型返回该项的值。

span.span: Returns the item's value as the specified type.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual object ValueAs (Type returnType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object ValueAs(class System.Type returnType) cil managed
Public Overridable Function ValueAs (returnType As Type) As Object
public: virtual System::Object ^ ValueAs(Type ^ returnType);

span.span: The type to return the item value as.

summary.span: 按照指定的类型返回该项的值。

span.span: Returns the item's value as the specified type.

returns.span: 以所请求类型表示的项值。

span.span: The value of the item as the type requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在派生类中重写时方法尝试将项的值转换[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]指定类型。When overridden in a derived class, the method attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type specified.

exception.span: 项值的目标类型的格式不正确。

span.span: The item's value is not in the correct format for the target type.

exception.span: 试图进行的强制转换无效。

span.span: The attempted cast is not valid.

exception.span: 尝试进行的强制转换导致溢出。

span.span: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract object ValueAs (Type returnType, System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver nsResolver);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object ValueAs(class System.Type returnType, class System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver nsResolver) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function ValueAs (returnType As Type, nsResolver As IXmlNamespaceResolver) As Object
public: abstract System::Object ^ ValueAs(Type ^ returnType, System::Xml::IXmlNamespaceResolver ^ nsResolver);

span.span: The type to return the item's value as.

param.name: nsResolver
param.span: 用于解析命名空间前缀的 对象。

span.span: The object used to resolve namespace prefixes.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，以指定用于解析命名空间前缀的 对象所指定的类型返回项值。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the item's value as the type specified using the object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.

returns.span: 以所请求类型表示的项值。

span.span: The value of the item as the type requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在派生类中重写时方法尝试将项的值转换[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]指定类型。When overridden in a derived class, the method attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type specified. 对象用于解析与类型转换有关的命名空间前缀。The object is used to resolve namespace prefixes related to type conversions. 例如，转换时`xs:QName`到`xs:string`。For example, when converting an `xs:QName` to an `xs:string`. 有关类型的详细信息，支持在命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).

exception.span: 项值的目标类型的格式不正确。

span.span: The item's value is not in the correct format for the target type.

exception.span: 试图进行的强制转换无效。

span.span: The attempted cast is not valid.

exception.span: 尝试进行的强制转换导致溢出。

span.span: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.

public: abstract property bool ValueAsBoolean { bool get(); };

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，获取该项的 数据类型的值。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as a .

value.span: 该项的 数据类型的值。

span.span: The item's value as a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性尝试将项的值转换[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]根据 XPath 2.0 规则项的类型强制转换的类型。The property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type. 有关类型的详细信息，支持在命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).

exception.span: 该项值的 类型的格式不正确。

span.span: The item's value is not in the correct format for the type.

exception.span: 尝试到 的强制转换无效。

span.span: The attempted cast to is not valid.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，获取该项的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]类型。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type of the item.
The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type of the item.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在派生类中重写时属性可以获取[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]的项的类型化值的类型。When overridden in a derived class, the property gets the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type of the typed value of the item. 例如，类型的元素`xs:int`都的默认情况下。For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a of by default. 但是，可能是任何一种可以映射到有效类型`xs:int`，如或。However, the could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int`, such as or . 有关类型的详细信息，支持在命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).

para.span: 所有的实施者必须提供属性的每个项，即使它只是。

span.span: All implementers must provide a property for every item, even if it is only .
